price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ampa sε Nyankopͻn ate (ͻbaa) no a ͻne wo rekasa fa ne kunu ho na ͻde n’asεm ato Nyankopͻn anim no asεm no, na Nyankopͻn te mo mmienu nkͻmmͻ no. Nokorε sε Onyankopͻn ne Otiefoͻ a Ɔte biribiara, na Ɔno ara nso na Ohu biribiara.
arabic: قَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّتِي تُجَٰدِلُكَ فِي زَوۡجِهَا وَتَشۡتَكِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ يَسۡمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَآۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qad samiʿa al-lahu qawla allatī tujādiluka fī zawjihā watashtakī ilā al-lahi wal-lahu yasmaʿu taḥāwurakumā inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
